292.SystemMessage7: Template used: "No processing time available"; last updated: 2025-05-29 21:12:07.368
292.SystemMessage9: Template used: "Tracking Info - All brands"; last updated: 2023-10-10 16:47:28.277
292.AgentMessage4:
Braun: Thank you for clarifying! Please note that after you place your order, it goes through an order processing stage (preparing, packaging, etc.), which can take up to 3 business days. Once it's handed off to the carrier, your selected shipping method will kick in from there. Orders are typically delivered within 5-8 business days via USPS. Actual delivery time depends on shipping distance and may vary. The amount of time it takes for you to receive a product will depend on how long it takes us to process your order and how long it takes the carrier to deliver the order to you once it is shipped. You'll get a tracking email as soon as your order ships. If you don't see it in your inbox, be sure to check your spam and promo folders; sometimes our emails end up there as well. 

I hope this clarifies it! Just to confirm, are we all set now?

295.SystemMessage9: Template used: "What should I do if my package says delivered but I don't have it?"; last updated: 2025-10-24 16:24:01.166
295.AgentMessage1:
HEYDUDE: I'm sorry to hear you haven't received your order yet! To confirm, are you referring to Order #14648049? If so, I see that this order was delivered on 1/15.

If your tracking says the package was delivered but you haven't received it, I recommend checking around your home and with nearby houses, just in case it was dropped off by mistake. Also, check with anyone you live with, like family, roommates, or a landlord, to see if they accepted it for you. Sometimes packages are also held by property managers, an apartment office, or even your local post office. Let me know if you can't find it, I'm here to help!
